item.description:
Report X-2024081801

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-26
  • City: COCOA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Unmarked box found leaking on delivery truck during AM sort. Box removed from vehicle and inspected. Inner box found to have Class 8 diamond and UN2794 markings with Pb battery. Due to no directional arrows or hazmat markings on the outer box, package had been transported on conveyor system and loaded sideways causing battery to spill. Packing slip on side of outer box only lists item as Battery Start 12V
